name: Acid Resistance
notes: Absorbs the first 10 points of acid damage per attack (as resist energy). Faint abjuration; CL 3rd Craft Magic Arms and Armor; resist energy

name: Acid Resistance, Improved
notes: As acid resistance, but absorbs the first 20 points of acid damage per attack. Moderate abjuration; CL 7th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; resist energy

name: Acid Resistance, Greater
notes: As acid resistance, but absorbs the first 30 points of acid damage per attack. Moderate abjuration; CL 11th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; resist energy

name: Cold Resistance, Greater
notes: As cold resistance, but absorbs the first 30 points of cold damage per attack. Moderate abjuration; CL 11th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; resist energy

name: Etherealness
notes: On command, wearer becomes ethereal (ethereal jaunt) 1/day; duration until wearer returns to normal. Strong transmutation; CL 13th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; ethereal jaunt

name: Glamered
notes: On command, appears as normal clothing; retains all properties; true seeing reveals true nature. Moderate illusion; CL 10th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; disguise self

name: Shadow
notes: +5 competence bonus on Hide checks (ACP still applies). Faint illusion; CL 5th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; invisibility

name: Shadow, Improved
notes: +10 competence bonus on Hide checks (ACP still applies). Moderate illusion; CL 10th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; invisibility

name: Shadow, Greater
notes: +15 competence bonus on Hide checks (ACP still applies). Moderate illusion; CL 15th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; invisibility

name: Silent Moves
notes: +5 competence bonus on Move Silently checks (ACP still applies). Faint illusion; CL 5th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; silence

name: Silent Moves, Improved
notes: +10 competence bonus on Move Silently checks (ACP still applies). Moderate illusion; CL 10th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; silence

name: Silent Moves, Greater
notes: +15 competence bonus on Move Silently checks (ACP still applies). Moderate illusion; CL 15th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; silence

name: Slick
notes: +5 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks (ACP still applies). Faint conjuration; CL 4th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; grease

name: Slick, Improved
notes: +10 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks (ACP still applies). Moderate conjuration; CL 10th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; grease

name: Slick, Greater
notes: +15 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks (ACP still applies). Moderate conjuration; CL 15th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; grease

name: Undead Controlling
notes: Control up to 26 HD of undead/day (as control undead); control ends at dawn; bone-like appearance is cosmetic. Strong necromancy; CL 13th Craft Magic Arms and Armor; control undead
